title: Understanding transportation impact on food choices
description: Understanding transportation impact on food choices
content:
Scenario: Understanding transportation impact on food choices
    Given transportation contributes to food's environmental footprint
    And Aisha lives in an urban area
    When the bioregional_elohim analyzes her shopping patterns
    Then it should consider transportation in environmental impact
    And it should suggest efficient shopping routes
    And it should help her minimize transportation emissions
    And the full ecological cost including transport should be visible
    And bioregional analysis should inform sustainable choices
